Question: Required to perform on the violin, this person went through two months of intense training, four to six hours a day.
Hints: This person was living in New York City with Cazale, who had been diagnosed with bone cancer.
In the 1990s, this person continued to choose a great variety of roles.
In 2009, this person played chef Julia Child in Nora Ephron's Julie & Julia, co-starring Amy Adams and Stanley Tucci.
